alert.note: Alert for Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 10:01AM PST until March 10 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Lingering light snow showers today. Heavy snow possible starting Thursday morning. Total snow accumulations up to 2 to 3 feet possible above 3000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1500 to 2500 feet today. Snow levels 2500 to 3500 feet Thursday, rising quickly to 5500 to 7000 feet by Friday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
